Summary: In this notebook, we'll read in PDF files. 

```{r}
library(tesseract)
library(tidytext)
library(tidyverse)


eng <- tesseract("eng")
```


```{r}
text <- tesseract::ocr("http://jeroen.github.io/images/testocr.png", engine = eng)
cat(text)
```
## Now find


```{r}
pngfile <- pdftools::pdf_convert('~/Downloads/service-ll-usrep-usrep095-usrep095670-usrep095670.pdf', dpi = 600)
```


```{r}
text <- tesseract::ocr(pngfile)

cat(text[1])
```



```{r}
## First put it into a data.frame 
df <- tibble(doc = 1, text = text[1])

## split into one word (token) per row
tokens <- df %>% 
  tidytext::unnest_tokens(word, text)


words <- tokens %>% 
  count(word, sort = TRUE) %>% 
  filter(nchar(word) > 5)

## create a plot 

```
